name: Depthplosion
description:
Part of Ludum Dare 48 [Compo, made in 48 Hours]

Depthplosion is all about letting bombs do the digging work. However, it requires you to stay back and watch without getting caught by the explosive digging. Try to get as deep as possible to increase your "Depth Record".

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

Spacebar - Jump

R - Restart

Esc - Exit
